DataElement.preferredName: Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ2) Last Two Weeks How Often Little Interest or Pleasure in Doing Things Score 4 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how often over the last 2 weeks they have been bothered by having little interest or pleasure doing things, using a four point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Health Questionnaire - 2 Item Last Two Weeks How Often Little Interest or Pleasure in Doing Things Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A 2-item scale used to screen for depression and anhedonia over the past 2 weeks. It is comprised of the first 2 items of the Patient Health Questionnaire-9._Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining._A natural number greater than 1 and less than 3 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of one and one._Any period of seven consecutive days._The number of occurrences of something within a given time period. (NCI)_A question about whether an individual has or had little interest or pleasure in doing things._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A 2-item scale used to screen for depression and anhedonia over the past 2 weeks. It is comprised of the first 2 items of the Patient Health Questionnaire-9.

Concepts.definition: A 2-item scale used to screen for depression and anhedonia over the past 2 weeks. It is comprised of the first 2 items of the Patient Health Questionnaire-9.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The number of occurrences of something within a given time period. ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not quite or just short of.: Including all possibilities or occurring at regular intervals.: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.

Including all possibilities or occurring at regular intervals.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A time period that includes one-half of the total number of days plus at least one more.

Concepts.definition: A time period that includes one-half of the total number of days plus at least one more.
